centurio
Class UCT

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      centurio.UCT
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
URPar, URSeq, URSolo
public abstract class UCT
extends java.lang.Thread

This class implements an artificial intelligence which bases on Upper Confidence bounds applied to Trees.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Felix Maximilian Möller, Marius Schneider, Martin Wegner

calc_Episode

protected double[] calc_Episode(Node node)
This method goes through a path of the gametree until it reaches a node which is terminal, a node which hasn't any visits or a node which hasn't any childs until now. In the second case a random game will be played. In the third his children will be calculated (next states) and one of them will be chosen for another call of playSimulation

Parameters:
node - the current node in the path
Returns:
returns the result of simulation (between 0 and 1, see also playRandomGame)

URSelect

protected abstract Child URSelect(Node node)
Select a child-node of a node which has the highest uct-value. The uct-value will be calculated with the winning probability and the number of visits of child-node and the parent-node. This decides which node will be examined next.

Parameters:
node - parent-node
Returns:
the child-node with the highest uct-value

update_Child

protected abstract void update_Child(Child child,
                                     Node node,
                                     double[] result,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> usedActions)
Updates the information about a Child with a given result of random game,

Parameters:
child - the child of node the information should be updated for
node - The node that´s child should be updated
result - has influence to the update
usedActions - list of actions are used in the past

sortChilds

protected void sortChilds(Node node)
Sorts the childs of a node with reference to heuristic values

Parameters:
node - its childs will be sorted
